sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"overview"}}>{`Overview`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The Pando Network is a network of Decentralized Autonomous Contents relying on pando: a distributed `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Version_control"}}>{`versioning control system`}</MDXTag>{` enforcing `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Decentralized_autonomous_organization"}}>{`DAO-based`}</MDXTag>{` version-control, lineage tracking and governance.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Pando is built on top of `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://ipfs.io/"}}>{`IPFS`}</MDXTag>{`, `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://ethereum.org/"}}>{`ethereum`}</MDXTag>{` and `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://aragon.one/os"}}>{`aragonOS`}</MDXTag>{`. Its goal is to become a `}<MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="p">{`de facto`}</MDXTag>{` standard. Pando’s specification and implementation are thus intended to be open-source and community-driven.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`One way to understand what pando is to think about it as a distributed alternative to traditional versioning systems like git. Another one is to think about it as a tool to track and govern the genesis of contents the same way an ecosystem works. A last one is to think about pando as a universal public infrastructure to create, host and link contents: softwares, writings, musics, videos, etc.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"audience"}}>{`Audience`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The pando network is for:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Creators who want to access all the features blockchain can offer: immutability, funding, etc.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Developers who want to build content-centric platforms: music, video, blogging, software, etc.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"rationale"}}>{`Rationale`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The core principles of pando are the following.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"distributed"}}>{`Distributed`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Pando implements a fully distributed architecture: its storage rely on IPFS while its governance schemes are enforced through smart-contracts stored and executed on the ethereum blockchain.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"uncensorable"}}>{`Uncensorable`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This distributed architecture guarantees that `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`contents hosted through pando are uncensorable and can survive most infrastructure breakdowns`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"immutable"}}>{`Immutable`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Pando is designed to guarantee the immutability of contents. The pairing of both IPFS and the ethereum blockchain guarantees a timeless archiving of every pando-hosted content and thus that `}<MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`these contents are uncensorable even by their own authors`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This features makes pando unique in the field of versioning and archiving systems and, probably, not suited to all needs.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"autonomous"}}>{`Autonomous`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Pando is designed to guarantee the autonomy of contents: due to its distributed architecture no one except creators can decide of their content's destiny.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"modular"}}>{`Modular`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`// TBD`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Pando do not rely on a binary permission scheme where one is granted either full or no authority over a content. Pando is designed to grant each contributors of a content a given amount of authority over this content with respect to the « value » of their contributions.`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
